name: Heaven (itch) (Olivia Haines)
description:
˖⁺‧₊˚♡˚₊‧⁺˖ Welcome to Olivia's Heaven ⁺‧₊˚♡˚₊‧⁺˖

︵‿︵‿୨♡୧‿︵‿︵

This is the home of my unfinished, abandoned or forgotten games.

Unfinished projects go to Heaven (everyone knows that) and get to rest in peace.

The projects are all from between 2016-2022 and if you've followed me during that time, you may see some familiar faces. Almost all the assets in Heaven are copied straight from old projects, so keep in mind a lot of them were made a long time ago ^^'

Please treat Heaven as a virtual gallery rather than a game. It's just a showcase of various things I've made over the years that never made it to released games. Please enjoy exploring and wondering what these games could've been

Credits:

'Heaven' font: Cherish by Asterism

Music by Andy Brophy

⁺‧₊˚♡˚₊‧⁺˖
